lead_paragraph: Aliaskhab Kebekov, 43, the leader of the Caucasus Emirate, the most active militant group in Russia, was shot to death in a counterterrorism operation, according to several reports.

headline.print_headline: Militant Chief in Russia Is Shot Dead, Reports Say
headline.main: Leader of Militant Group in Russia Is Killed, Reports Say

snippet: Aliaskhab Kebekov, 43, the leader of the Caucasus Emirate, the most active militant group in Russia, was shot to death in a counterterrorism operation, according to several reports.
abstract: Russian authorities announce killing of Aliaskhab Kebekov, leader of prominent militant group Caucasus Emirate, in counterterrorism operation.
